verbs.description: [ARG0: announcer dick stockton] [V: makes] [ARG1: embarrassing ‘ denver nuggets’ blunder announcer] dick stockton got his denver sports teams confused on sunday stockton was calling a promo before the start of sunday denver broncos - los angeles rams game he erroneously said the upcoming game was between the denver nuggets and rams i guess the denver nuggets and not the bronco are playing the la rams today at mile high stadium listen to the fox broadcaster during the clip pic twitter com 06ogqrdylx st louis rams denver rams dick stockton denver nuggets
